website_summaries.verdict: The wireless, cable-free SOL Republic Amps Air headphones deliver thunderous bass, a wildly sculpted sound signature, and limited on-ear controls.
pros: Powerful, heavily sculpted audio performance with bass-forward sound signature
Ships with battery-charging case that carries multiple extra charges
Case can also charge mobile devices
cons: Can't adjust volume or navigate tracks using on-ear controls
Easy to misfire and unintentionally play/pause tracks

customer_reviews.title: Horrible disconnection problems
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in may this year and they were working excellently up untill about a month ago. Now when i try to use both ear buds at the same time they contiuously disconnect from my device and reconnect over and over within seconds each time. Tried messaging the cusomter support on sol republic but had no respones both times i tried (both a week apart). Also no warrenty in the box which is a pain given the price and since i have been very careful with the product and have no obvious reason for the problem to have arisen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I found a better quality pair from Anker but even Air Pods are ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I can hear a huge amount of distortion in these headphones, I found a better quality pair from Anker but even Air Pods are better for its price. I have owned 4 pairs of these btw, this was not a one off issue. Sol Republic have not yet tried to resolve the issue. Strongly advised to avoid these for a bad battery time and terrible sound quality. Shame because I own some over ears by Sol Republic that are pretty unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Balance out at higher volumes
customer_reviews.text: I really really wanted to like these. The charging case being an excellent idea - saves carrying extra gadgets. Unfortunately - when I cranked the volume up past half way, the right channel was quieter than the left. I tried with adjusting how they sat in my ear etc etc but found the only solution was to adjust the balance on the phone. Which is annoying as, at lower volumes, it goes back to being fine. Meant switching from headphone to car etc you had to adjust the balance all the time. 1st world problem I know. Sent them back for a refund
customer_reviews.author: RJF

customer_reviews.title: Bargain great quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. I have tried many look on Amazon warehouse got mine for 40.00 bargain get in quick you don't be disapoonted.
customer_reviews.author: GAW

customer_reviews.title: Baddddd very bad.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this earphones few months ago and since this hadn't used often enough, since I start to use a little bit morre many issues start to appear... Sometimes one side get lower than the other, constantly losing Bluetooth connection, is not very comfortable for long use (over 2h), sometimes is annoying to connect on the phone and the most important is already loosing the seal what holds everything "water and sweat resistant" (and I care a lot my stuffs)! Very disappointed, waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Ravi silk

customer_reviews.title: Truly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Please don't buy these... Me and my brother have been fans of sol republic for 5 years+ so when I found these I was excited has I'm not a big fan on headphones but loved the quality of them... I orders these on January the 8th... By the 1st week of March the right earphones stated to make crackling noised and slowly start to stop working. Be the 1st of April I no longer could use it so I was left to only using the left one but now this one has started to do the same. I'm truly disappointed I've been let down from a brand I loved... Wouldn't recommend these to anyone...
customer_reviews.author: Athena k.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant sound, occasionally dislodge
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the sound quality I mainly use to listen to radio 4 speech but sometimes classical music. Extraordinary good stereo effect for sound theatre for symphonic or opera No significant pairing problems Occasionally fall out and I listen in bed not at gym Useful mono pairing for radio
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great - but only for looking at
customer_reviews.text: Positives: Great product, excellent sound from such a small package Negatives: Unuasable for sport as they keep falling out, mic is terrible and picks up everything except your voice! Summary - buy these for a great pair of headphones to use wire-free at your desk or in bed. Don't expect to be able to use them while moving, or for talking on.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Terrible connection 0/10
customer_reviews.text: Design looks fancy, durable, and good; reality is exact opposite. - You've to pack and unpack each earplug several times per day as neither connect at the same time. - Customer Support is abominably "automated", where a robot sends more problems than solutions. - Twitter support: they didn't answer, twice, over two months. From one to ten I'd ask them zero; only design is quality; as the internal part, after few weeks, reveals its flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Julius Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Does what you need it to
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of headphones. Good quality sound and comfortable. I was able to connect/pair them really quickly with my Android phone, but for some reason while they were on, they disconnected and it was really difficult to repair. I needed to follow a YouTube video before they would reconnect. Handy little carry charger case.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Jespersen

customer_reviews.title: Good but not noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used these twice but they seem fantastic! Love the charging case as it means I won’t lose them! They’re not as noise cancelling as I’d like, but they do the job well. The earbuds do stay in when working out, and they’re comfy too. They were incredibly easy to pair to my phone too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awful. I’ve used them properly for the first time today. In 15 minutes of trying to watch the F1 qualifying I had to come out of the Sky app and reconnect the headphone 11 times!!!! Absolutely useless and wouldn’t fee they are good value for £5!!
customer_reviews.author: M Smyth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect apart from occasional connecting issues
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and the range. When testing it I was able to go almost anywhere in my house without the earphones cutting out. My only problem with them would be that they can be a pain to connect. They’re already paired to my phone but sometimes only one works so then I have to switch them off and on again.
customer_reviews.author: Ahm

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I read a few 1 star reviews on this product and was almost put off but I took the risk, and I'm happy I did. Read the instructions properly, use the correct size earbud and put in your ear correct and the sound is great for wireless.. plus the Bluetooth connection is really good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken and not connecting
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are not worth the cost they are cheap feeling and I have had nothing but problems with them. The left one has completely broken and no longer works and pairing them takes a couple of minutes when they do decide to work they have been near useless. This may just be a problem with mine but they are near useless especially for the £50 I paid
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great true wireless earphones (buds,pods...) Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Really great set of true wireless earphones. Although I did get them for around £50. The price seamed to go up after I bought them which is a shame as I wanted to get another one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality and design, great battery life.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was sub-par for the price. They didn't stay in my ears properly (tried every size of ear bud). I also couldn't tell if they were slipping from my ear and would fall out very quickly. I almost stood on them a couple of times. The battery life and the carry case that can double as a usb charger saved this from a one star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Shape of things to come - rechargeable using supplied cable.
customer_reviews.text: No more ear cables - brilliant device but not cheap. Charges automatically when you put them back in their case.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick Man

customer_reviews.title: When it worked it was great but since the right bud failed to connect it doesnt count for much
customer_reviews.text: Right ear bud fails to connect with the left one after a while and switches off. I dont know if this is a common problem but this has been my experience. Until then the buds worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Praveen Muthusamy

customer_reviews.title: Sol Republics Amps Air
customer_reviews.text: It’s really brilliant, definitely in league with beats and apple ear pods - if not better, especially in terms of cost. Worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Gemini Man

customer_reviews.title: Headphones life length.
customer_reviews.text: High price for product, only lasted 18 months before one ear bud stopped working. Other ear bud has lost quality of sound too.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gr8 sound but find they dont stay in the ears very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality amazing
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is amazing evan at loud volumes, comfortable fit and look very stylish
customer_reviews.author: Dhillon S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for 24hrs, now I wish I had gone with another option.
customer_reviews.text: Really loved them for 24hrs, they fit well and they paired well, however, once I paired them to my laptop and then tried to pair them back, they now refuse to pair with each other so i am reduced to Mono sound out of one ear for the last week even though I have gone through all the instructed steps from Sol Republic. I really would expect more from a product that costs as much as Jabra and Airpods which I have had absolutely no trouble with. Really wish I hadn't got these and will try and return them as customer service has not got back to me.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Poor Battery Life Steer Clear
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy if you want an earbud that lasts for more than one hour. I have had these since 28 June and they are going back as I'm fed up with having to charge after one hour of listening.
customer_reviews.author: Gezz

customer_reviews.title: Good earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs of these (one here on Amazon, one at Best Buy). I've had to contact support on two different occasions. The first time one of the charging cases failed (a pogo pin recessed into the charger); the second time, an earbud stopped powering on altogether. In both cases, the company was very quick to respond and ship replacements. Overall, I'm very happy with my purchase. As far as the quality goes, I will preface with... I'm no audiophile. The batteries last as expected, the Bluetooth connection has been trouble free for me, the sound quality is good. I doubt however, I would buy another pair. I will be going back to corded headphones on my next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NoizeMaykr

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless headset
customer_reviews.text: I had tried two Wireless headsets before this one, the first one did not have enough bass or volume and the other, one of the speakers had trouble connecting. This headset is the best I have tried, it has great bass and enough volume that you can cut the grass and still hear the music, had a little trouble connecting at first but once I read the manual there was no problem, so if you're looking for a wireless headset that allows you the freedom to workout, jog and listen to music, this headsets for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product came used
customer_reviews.text: The product box I received was already opened. The earbuds were dirty and shoved awkwardly in the grooves. The extra ear pieces were torn open and scattered about. There was no user manual. The sound quality is terrible! I really tried to like this product. I watched videos and researched how to connect with devices, etc. they just left me frustrated. For the price of the buds, they are definitely not up to par. ETA: I bought some skull candy inked wireless at Walmart today. WAY BETTER SOUND! Less money too. Not “true wireless”, they still have the wired behind your head, but I’ll take that for the sound superiority!
customer_reviews.author: smithdv

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the sound of these earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the sound of these earbuds. The best sounding I had. I loved the bass. In terms of bass they were the best. I had to return them however because any device I used could not stay connected for more than 5 minutes. It was so frustrating to finally find the sound I had been looking for and not be able to use it. They kept disconnecting. I tried everything, read pairing instructions and watched videos, even called customer service, but nothing helped.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great but they don’t last as long.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a year now. And I’m finally getting to reviewing it since I forgot. Sound wise there great. Better than expected. But when it come to battery life I guess as you go on using them the battery capacity starts to drop. Now it’s only lasts about 3 hours. Also sweat gets trapped between the rubber covers and the actual bud. So once in a while I gotta pull them off to wipe it off. They range it’s decent. Not great but then again their tiny ear buds. But overall pretty good product.
customer_reviews.author: Charliey24

customer_reviews.title: Should Be A Great AirPods Competitor
customer_reviews.text: The Amps Air, based on my usage, are everything I wanted in a pair of truly wireless headphones. They have great sound quality, a good case that cleverly allows for charging of your phone as well, and a great fit in the ear. If this was the whole story, it'd be a 5 star product. Unfortunately, the left ear lost connection to the right ear, and no matter how much unpairing/repairing I did, the connection never restabilizied. Ultimately, I ended up returning them less than 30 days after I bought them due to this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding ear buds but disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I gave e these 5 stars for the sound . The sound is amazing. However their connectivity lacks. Just before bt5.0 came in the picture, they gave me a lot of problems like they drop out when I would put my phone in my pocket. It was very annoying that's why I looked into getting a new pair but the next ones that came out were a little expensive for me at the time . So I looked for something else. Sol republic, you need to better your product and bring your price down to a competitive level. There are other earbuds that sound great and are far less expensive. Keep up guys.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Bulky. Pairing to Bluetooth seemed by chance rather than plan.
customer_reviews.text: Bulky. Pairing to Bluetooth seemed by chance rather than plan. Still in the infancy of true wireless and effortless headphones. Revision:Pairing is an extreme hassle and they love showing up as mono independent buds and need reset. About to be chucked in trash.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this outdated model.
customer_reviews.text: i thought I would take a chance on the original model of these Amps Air because i like the idea of independent mono buds. I only use one at a time so I can still hear my surroundings. Anyway, buds wouldn't pair and then Amazon doesn't want to make returns easy. Trying to get me to try the same dang thing over and over. I am adept at these types of electronics. When the manufacture admits a problem and creates 2.0 to replace then 1.0 should be removed from the market. Now I'm left wondering if Amazon is going to return my money. I didn't think Amazon Prime was that type of company. I should have purchased directly from manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: cisalb

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, Not great for running, Lasted a year and stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Got the product about a year ago. Works fine for general listening. Not great for running as I have to consistently put them back in or adjust them. The case is nice that it charges more than once and can charge items externally, but the case and headphones do not always sync correctly and will connect while in the case and kill the battery at times. Had to turn off the Bluetooth on my phone so they wouldn't connect randomly. After a year, they no longer connect to my phone. They still appear to charge and the case will charge, but won't connect. Overall, they're fine, but I'll be looking elsewhere for a new pair of earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only one pairs.. crap!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well I bought these hoping they wouldn’t be a piece of crap and they are crap. Most of the time only one will pair but they will both pair every now and then. Conveniently they do this when I can’t return them. Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: Geoff H.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Great Headphones!!!
customer_reviews.text: Presently surprised with the quality of these! Sound is pretty good compared to Powerbeats 2 and 3 and battery life has been surprisingly long too. Comfortable and quality are the main important thing here and the Amps Air deliver, the case is kind of on the cheap side when it comes to the lid but otherwise these are amazing and would definitely recommend giving them a try. Pairs easily with my iPhone X and battery life shows right on the screen. Great pair for $99
customer_reviews.author: Buyers Remorse

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these several months ago and at first I was impressed as they performed as advertised, but a couple of months into it one of the earbuds stop working altogether, would not connect, would not even turn on. I accepted and used the other ear piece as a single earbud for watching movies and listing to music while at work. Well the second earbud stopped working also, same thing, no sound, no connection. I expected more for the $100 spent. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: ... using them for about 2 months and they last pretty long before having to throw them back in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using them for about 2 months and they last pretty long before having to throw them back in the case. They work amazing and haven't fallen out at all. I'm a huge sol republic fan. I have almost every headphone they have come out with and these definitely don't disappoint. Sol always comes out with some amazing headphones. My only gripe is that the mic isn't that great most people say they have some trouble hearing me but I'm pretty sure it is because the mic hole on the silicone sleeve is too small. I'm really satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, last about a year.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these earbuds for a year and they worked great until the right unit lost about 50% of its volume randomly and stopped pairing. I'm pretty hard on them, so I take it as a casualty of war. Just ordered another set, hopefully I get the same or greater life out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_shopper

customer_reviews.title: They sent us USED ONES.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I listed this even as a 2 star is because my husband has used these headphones before and other than a connectivity issue, the sound was fine and they worked well. However, even though the condition says "New", the ones we received had been opened and were quite obviously USED, which is very gross and unhygienic.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: I've also had great experience with Sol headphones in the past
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for reliable wireless earbuds that can stay in during workouts, sol checked the boxes with the Amps Air. Over the past week the Amps Air have never lost connection with my phone, haven't fallen out on trail runs, and sound decent. I've also had great experience with Sol headphones in the past, so hope the good vibes continue.
customer_reviews.author: Sara M Reasoner

customer_reviews.title: Very great earphones. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Fit very comfortably after finding the right ear cups. Sound quality is very good with plenty of volume. Would appreciate some additional functionality from the ear piece, but appreciate the simplicity of finding the button while in ear. Pairing is finicky at times, but always is solved by simply placing both ear pieces back in the case and removing them again. Case is small(ish) but does not need constant charging like some competitors. Would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Croft

customer_reviews.title: Micro but full of sound.
customer_reviews.text: Great earbud with superb sound quality. The only downfall they do not like to connect via Bluetooth one at a time, if you only wanted to have sound in one ear only.
customer_reviews.author: Fridayone8

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Not working
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months use, I rarely use them. The right ear piece is not charging and doesn’t even turn on! No signs of working. I’m extremely disappointed because these weren’t cheap! I should’ve bought the apple EarPods .
customer_reviews.author: Mely

customer_reviews.title: STOP, LOOK and LISTEN!
customer_reviews.text: They are sending out great earbuds with a pod that does not charge. I have sent back 2 pair and decided to keep the 3rd pair because I have a old pod that works. Again, if you don't have an old functioning pod, you are making a gamble on the pod.
customer_reviews.author: Nyree

customer_reviews.title: amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: the sound is amazing. the case is a bit heavy but i should not complain given how massive the battery is. my only real issue is that they don't stay in as much as i would like but they do stay in very well. if i were to jar my head around i can feel them come loose and the quality does not come through as clearly and they fall out easier. so i used memory foam and that fixed the issue
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: An expensive lesson
customer_reviews.text: They're... Ok... But for the price, you expect so much more and they just don't deliver in the end. Highs are squelchy, no bass. Coulax cost q third as much and blow them away.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Adams

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound and excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product!!! Its my second pair since my brother fell in love with my first one :-)! Sounds absolutely amazing...bass is strong and the noise cancelling feature is a win for me. Perfect for running outside and love that I can get lost in my own world even inside the gym!
customer_reviews.author: Kit M

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Connection is easy, and sound quality excellent. Problem is the microphone. I used it for several days and all callers complained that I was nearly impossible to hear. Great if all you want is to listen to music. No so much of you actually make and receive calls.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepdoc

customer_reviews.title: Great ear buds once you find the right fit with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great ear buds once you find the right fit with the rubber covers. The sound is very loud and clear, and pairs perfectly with my phone. (Samsung) I use them all the time, and the charge on them is great!! I charge the case once to twice a week and the ear buds have never died on me! Really great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley mihalko

customer_reviews.title: Get these!
customer_reviews.text: Best wireless earbuds. Loudness and sound quality are the 2 main problems with most wireless earbuds. Sol Republic nailed both. Comfort is dependent on the tips, I use memory foam which gives it a better seal, subsequently giving it an even better sound. If you get a good deal, then you don't have to worry about them falling out, so 2 birds, one stone with the memory foam tips for me, but to each is own, either way they're worth the money moreso than airpods or powerbeats.
customer_reviews.author: Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Great ear buds with great sound.
customer_reviews.text: These ear buds are superb. Nice bass as well as treble. Charging station is well thought out in that it can also charge your phone in an emergency. Can't beat SOL Republic's sound for the price. Much less than the cost of the Apple Air Buds and when I tried those in a store, they didn't fit my ears well... just a few minutes of trying them and they were uncomfortable. SOL's are comfortable and sound better... and less expensive. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: R. G.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted and More
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are exactly what I wanted and more. The sound is perfect. The bass is not lacking in any way. Good Bluetooth. And they stay in your ears like magic. I love these headphones so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This vendor persistently overclaims effectiveness.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible and non existent ability to speak over Bluetooth with one or both earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: The Professor

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: The only complaints I have are they only last me 2.5 hours instead of the 3+ I keep reading about in reviews. Also, they drop out frequently and the touch button is extremely touchy and I have to stop what I'm doing to sync them again. Also, they aren't very sweat resistant. They get a bit of moisture from a workout and they start to slip. Decent sound for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Norton

customer_reviews.title: Best earbuds to date
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been through many ear buds, these have the best sound of them all, nice to not get an ear bud jerked out of my ears when turning the head too fast and the wire pulling one out.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Daniel Everhart

customer_reviews.title: I purchased a VERY inexpensive pair 1st and the sound was Horrible from another Manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: You can NOT go wrong with these! I purchased a VERY inexpensive pair 1st and the sound was Horrible from another Manufacturer. I purchased these the next day and they are AWESOME. Trust me, spend the extra money, they are worth it
customer_reviews.author: Ken Smith

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE WITH THIS EARBUD AFTER TRYING SO MANY
customer_reviews.text: OMG IDK HOW MANY OF THE REVIEW HERE ARE REAL BUT I just tried 15 diff earbuds even the bose and new Sony and this SOL REPUBLIC ARE AWESOME finally found something worth that money fast connect no problems at all and sounds great super loud super clear I'm so happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: batteries
customer_reviews.text: You will be happy with it for less than two years that is when the internal battery is dead! And then will will try how to replace the battery and will discover the there is no way! The solution is to drop it in the garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Wagner Paula Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Find A Different Alternative
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds are too big so they kept falling out of my ears, also the fit is not really that comfortable, the sound is mediocre, connectivity is usually a hassle. In an effort to save money I ended up buying these, but it was a bad investment. should have gone with the apple AirPods, thats my recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Erlin H.

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great for the price range
customer_reviews.text: The connection on the right ear bud stops 5 times every minute. Unusable. Sound is great for the price range; design is slick and comfortable. I am returning and trying a new pair. Until then, 1 star is all I can give.
customer_reviews.author: David Lee

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for charging issues after half a year of use.
customer_reviews.text: Sound, fit, design, were all GREAT. But 6 months later, the charging case won't charge the earpieces. Without power, sound fit and design suddenly doesn't really matter.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Qu

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the sound and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Pairing takes learning. Sound is better than expected and so far have lasted 3.5 hours on a single charge using medium volume. A bit pricey for ~$120 but a great buy under$100
customer_reviews.author: John Cocchiara

customer_reviews.title: Amps Air buds are amazing. Very long battery life
customer_reviews.text: Amps Air buds are amazing. Very long battery life. Comfortable fit in the ear, clear, pounding sound. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Knocky

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound and fit well in the ear and ...
customer_reviews.text: Ease with connectivity. Love the sound and fit well in the ear and do not have a problem with the staying in
customer_reviews.author: Action Jackson

customer_reviews.title: There pretty awesome earbuds but....
customer_reviews.text: I think they sound great they have a good bass, clear mids and a precise treble but connecting to my phone to the first time was easy but after 3 times of using them they stopped connecting I tried over an over again I tried updating my phone but that didn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Cameron killen

customer_reviews.title: Pairing issues
customer_reviews.text: These stopped pairing a month after purchase. I have tried trouble shooting these per the Amazon video but still they do not work. Not worth the money. Thought I was upgrading; but jokes on me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more than 2 hrs
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd pair of these (lost the first) love them. They don't work more than 2hrs continuous though.
customer_reviews.author: Rani

customer_reviews.title: Great Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: They connected easily to my phone's bluetooth (an issue w my old wireless set). The sound blocks all noise, children, husband, traffic nothing but music in my ears. Just got so can't review battery. The case feels solid and durable. The earbuds themselves fit great and do not feel heavy in my ears; no fear of them falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Brooks

customer_reviews.title: works great and got it a good price too
customer_reviews.text: tested and using the product, sleek and cute, although would have preferred different colors, works great and got it a good price too.
customer_reviews.author: skb

customer_reviews.title: Great sound - issues with pairing and charging.
customer_reviews.text: Have issue with getting them to pair and charge correctly. Otherwise, sound is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Harold F Johnson

customer_reviews.title: ... because the first 2 didn't work properly I'm very pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: Well after receiving a third pair because the first 2 didn't work properly I'm very pleased with them. They are awesome !!!! . The clarity and the bass are great. I would would recommend these to anyone. The price is right and I think they are just as good as anything that's priced over them.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Only down side is audio quality not that good but that is expected from most Bluetooth devices
customer_reviews.text: capatible with all forms of media. Battery life as expected 3 to 4 hrs continueos. Recharging cases is a little on the heavy side but recharges fast. Only down side is audio quality not that good but that is expected from most Bluetooth devices .
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Apple earbuds are a bit better..
customer_reviews.text: Talking on the phone is ok...Apple earbuds are a bit better.., but listening to music...WOW! These are awesome. I also use them as earplugs. They block out noise so well.
customer_reviews.author: Tamika Smith

customer_reviews.title: I will recommend to friends
customer_reviews.text: Quality at the highest level. I will recommend to friends. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Anton Golts

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER 3 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: THEY STOPPED WORKING AFTER 3 MONTHS AND THEY FALL OUT AT THE GYM ALL THE TIME. I BOUGHT A $22 PAIR FROM AMAZON AND SOUND THE SAME IF NOT BETTER.
customer_reviews.author: Vig

customer_reviews.title: A Fantastic pair of headphones. Solid Five Star!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned multiple pairs of wireless headphones from different brands, Beats Studio Wireless2, Powerbeats2, Bose SoundSport Wireless. But I am always searching for a pair of headphones that could bring true satisfaction. Amps Air did!!! They have great bass, clear highs and are truly wireless. After putting them right in my ears, I could barely feel them for hours. They feel great quality as well. The case carries a lot of power and can also be used as a charger to your phone. All in all, they worth every penny of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Zhuokai Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Okay sound and fit, but nothing great
customer_reviews.text: Okay sound if you dont really carry about the sound of your music. Nice highs, gets nothing for bass, and mids are okay. The earpieces really didn’t fit me great, however maybe they’re better for others. Overall, not really a fan. And I wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: London Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Great for fitness
customer_reviews.text: Great for fitness, comfortable, you can use them one at a time, good nose canceling, but the sound isn’t that good.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Work well so far
customer_reviews.text: They have work well so far but I have a question, is it common that they stop some times ? I mean in listening to any song and they can randomly stop sounding
customer_reviews.author: eduardo duran

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR WORKING OUT
customer_reviews.text: Great bass quality. Earphones stay really put on my ears and are extremely confortable. Poor high notes quality. Battery duration is useful enough. Case is amazing. GREAT FOR WORKING OUT AND TALKING ON THE PHONE. Poor mic quality tho.
customer_reviews.author: Diego González Roca

customer_reviews.title: Trouble staying in my ears
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about them! Great headphones! Sound could be better but unless you are trying to pick out flaws you won’t notice. Only problem I have is they are hard to make stay in my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best after trying 7 different brands
customer_reviews.text: By far the best sounding ear buds ever. super loud great base. I have bought pairs for 175.00 7 different all together. I finally found a pair great for the gym!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good while they last
customer_reviews.text: Finally stopped working and since I bought them 3rd party the manufacturer isn't helping repair
customer_reviews.author: garrick

customer_reviews.title: Good product so far
customer_reviews.text: Good product so far; a few syncing issues but not terrible. Sound quality? Well these are earbuds. Once you begin to progress away from full sized stereo speakers you must limit your expectations.
customer_reviews.author: DocDoc

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound  :))  but Frequent Bluetooth connectivity issues :(
customer_reviews.text: awesome bass and audio, reasonable battery life However, Bluetooth Pariing can be an issue. The mono feature I think skrews the pairing up. I would say 80% of the time it doesn't pair correctly and only pairs with one earbud Then you have to go to settings turn off the mono turn on the amps air turn off the earbuds, etc, etc... took me 10 minutes one time to get it right. Maybe next version or firmware? will make easier. The Sol Amps Air sound however is awesome for the unit and probably worth the hassle... at least for now.... until I find the ultimate wireless earbuds :-))
customer_reviews.author: Evolution Creation

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know, they disconnect suddenly and one piece after 1 week of use sounds like when something get wet like the it is damage already
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These sound amazing, fit great, easy to set up and use. The blue color is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item I receive is faulty. shipping to return cost me the same price of what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Kenvil

customer_reviews.title: Even if you won't use them to stream videos the Sol's still sound like staticky crap
customer_reviews.text: Video lag. Spend a little more money and buy AirPods. It's night and day. Even if you won't use them to stream videos the Sol's still sound like staticky crap. Heavy too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite to use
customer_reviews.text: I like them a lot plus I wanted to try something new rather than Beats.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: If u wnt to use em for phne call u would need extreme hearing abilities. sound quality sucks
customer_reviews.text: Battery only last for an hour. When I’m on a phone call, the mono sound quality is really low and i barely can here the quality.
customer_reviews.author: $Brandonn$

customer_reviews.title: One is damaged
customer_reviews.text: I loved it but a few months later, one of the EarPods did not work anymore. Where can I take them for repairing??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite okay
customer_reviews.text: Quite a lot of white noise. Sound not really clean. Great bass though
customer_reviews.author: Azhad Arif

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Fit My Ears
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sound but not the fit. They kept falling out of my ears so I returned them. They had a number of different sizes but none would work for me. The return was easy and the company was quick to credit the air buds back to my account.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Horn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, good sound, but blue tooth is touch--often only picks up one earbud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, easy, super bass, super powers, geat fit!!
customer_reviews.text: This things are amazing and super easy to pair. Sound quality is amazing. Bass is super good. Best in any headset even with wires ive ever had!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas harrison

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality. Fitted comfortably into my ears and good battery life as well. Only issue is, the sound seems to switch off and on automatically when connected to TV via Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Ho LW

customer_reviews.title: Good the only problem is that they fall from my ...
customer_reviews.text: Good the only problem is that they fall from my ears only few times, you have good bass quality excellent for gym.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

product_meta.title: SOL Republic Amps Air - Truly Wireless Earbuds, Bluetooth Earphones + Portable Charger Case for up to 45 Hour Play Time Battery Life, Sweat / Water Resistant, Perfect For Gym - Gold
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:GoldThis is wearable technology that sits in your ear. How it looks is as important as how it performs. Dozens of explorations led us to the ergonomic simplicity of Amps Air in striking, yet sophisticated finishes. Hear SOL REPUBLIC’s signature sound with immersive deep bass, amazing clarity and detailed highs that you normally hear in large, high end headphones. Get the perfect in ear seal and maximum noise isolation with 4 different ear tip sizes so you hear your music without the noises around you. Specially designed air grooves comfortably grip the ear like treads on a tire for a secure fit and allows air flow to reduce sweat build up. No need for complicated fit pieces or ear hooks that can hurt over time

BOX CONTAINS
Ear Buds;Portable Recharging Case;Instruction Booklet
feature_bullets: TRUE WIRELESS FREEDOM: Free from cables or neckbands to move unrestricted; whether working, exercising or taking calls with the integrated dual microphones. Bluetooth and Siri compatible
PREMIUM SOUND AND NOISE ISOLATION: SOL's signature sound. Powerful and immersive music with deep bass and amazing clarity. Perfect fit and maximum noise isolation with ear buds included in 4 sizes

RECHARGEABLE CASE: Included carrying case with high capacity 2200mAh battery recharges your Amps Air Earbuds more than 15 times and doubles as a battery backup for your phone. Up to 3 hours playtime between each charge
ULTRA LIGHT AND ERGONOMIC: The Amps Air's silicone design has been engineered to sit comfortably in your ears for hours on end
WORKOUT PROOF: The Amps Air are water and sweat resistant. Whether you're running, cycling or resistance training; these earbuds are 100% ready to endure even the toughest of workouts

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
